001package edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.viewmodel;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.content.SharedPreferences;
005import android.content.SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener;
006import android.util.Log;
007import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
008import androidx.lifecycle.DefaultLifecycleObserver;
009import androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner;
010import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
011import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;
012import androidx.lifecycle.Transformations;
013import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel;
014import androidx.preference.PreferenceManager;
015import dagger.hilt.android.lifecycle.HiltViewModel;
016import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
017import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.R;
018import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.Game;
019import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.Guess;
020import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.League;
021import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.Team;
022import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.service.TeamleRepository;
023import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.CompositeDisposable;
024import java.util.HashMap;
025import java.util.List;
026import java.util.Map;
027import java.util.Set;
028import java.util.TreeMap;
029import java.util.function.Function;
030import java.util.stream.Collectors;
031import javax.inject.Inject;
032import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
033
034/**
035 * Handles everything needed from the API for a game
036 */
037@HiltViewModel
038public class SportsDBViewModel extends ViewModel implements DefaultLifecycleObserver,
039    OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener {
040
041  private static final String TAG = SportsDBViewModel.class.getSimpleName();
042
043  private final TeamleRepository teamleRepository;
044  private final Map<String, List<League>> leaguesBySport;
045  private final Map<String, League> idToLeague;
046  private final MutableLiveData<Set<String>> sports;
047  private final MutableLiveData<List<League>> leagues;
048  private final MutableLiveData<List<Team>> teams;
049  private final MutableLiveData<Throwable> throwable;
050  private final MutableLiveData<Game> game;
051  private final LiveData<Guess> guess;
052  private final CompositeDisposable pending;
053  private final SharedPreferences prefs;
054  private final String sportKey;
055  private final String leagueKey;
056
057  /**
058   * Handles view model object
059   * @param context Context
060   * @param teamleRepository TeamleRepository
061   */
062  @Inject
063  public SportsDBViewModel(@ApplicationContext Context context, TeamleRepository teamleRepository) {
064    this.teamleRepository = teamleRepository;
065    leaguesBySport = new TreeMap<>();
066    idToLeague = new HashMap<>();
067    teams = new MutableLiveData<>();
068    sports = new MutableLiveData<>();
069    leagues = new MutableLiveData<>();
070    throwable = new MutableLiveData<>();
071    pending = new CompositeDisposable();
072    prefs = PreferenceManager.getDefaultSharedPreferences(context);
073    sportKey = context.getString(R.string.sport_key);
074    leagueKey = context.getString(R.string.league_key);
075    String preferredLeague = prefs.getString(context.getString(R.string.league_key), "");
076    game = new MutableLiveData<>();
077    guess = Transformations.map(game, (game) -> {
078      List<Guess> guesses = game.getGuesses();
079      return (game != null) ? guesses.get(guesses.size() - 1) : null;
080    });
081    fetchLeagues();
082    if (!preferredLeague.isEmpty()) {
083      fetchTeams(preferredLeague);
084    }
085
086  }
087
088  /**
089   * Gets all leagues in a specific sport
090   */
091  public void fetchLeagues() {
092    teamleRepository.getAllLeaguesBySport()
093        .subscribe(
094            (map) -> {
095              leaguesBySport.clear();
096              leaguesBySport.putAll(map);
097              sports.postValue(map.keySet());
098              prefs.registerOnSharedPreferenceChangeListener(this);
099            },
100            this::postThrowable,
101            pending
102        );
103  }
104
105  /**
106   * Gets all teams in a specific league
107   * @param leagueId String
108   */
109  public void fetchTeams(String leagueId) {
110    if (leagueId != null) {
111      teamleRepository.getAllTeamsByLeague(leagueId)
112          .subscribe(
113              teams::postValue,
114              this::postThrowable,
115              pending
116          );
117    }
118
119  }
120
121  /**
122   * Gets all leagues by ID
123   * @param id String
124   * @return leagueId
125   */
126  public League getLeagueById(String id) {
127    return idToLeague.get(id);
128  }
129
130  /**
131   * Starts a game
132   */
133  public void startGame() {
134    game.postValue(teamleRepository.startGame());
135  }
136
137  /**
138   * Submits a guess
139   * @param team Team
140   */
141  public void submitGuess(Team team) {
142    Log.d(TAG, team.toString());
143    teamleRepository.submitGuess(team);
144    game.postValue(game.getValue());
145  }
146
147  /**
148   * Gets all sports
149   * @return sports
150   */
151  public LiveData<Set<String>> getSports() {
152    return sports;
153  }
154
155  /**
156   * Gets all leagues
157   * @return leagues
158   */
159  public LiveData<List<League>> getLeagues() {
160    return leagues;
161  }
162
163  /**
164   * Gets all teams
165   * @return teams
166   */
167  public LiveData<List<Team>> getTeams() {
168    return teams;
169  }
170
171  /**
172   * Gets games
173   * @return game
174   */
175  public LiveData<Game> getGame() {
176    return game;
177  }
178
179  /**
180   * Gets guess
181   * @return guess
182   */
183  public LiveData<Guess> getGuess() {
184    return guess;
185  }
186
187  /**
188   * gets a throwable
189   * @return throwable
190   */
191  public LiveData<Throwable> getThrowable() {
192    return throwable;
193  }
194
195  @Override
196  public void onStop(@NotNull LifecycleOwner owner) {
197    pending.clear();
198    DefaultLifecycleObserver.super.onStop(owner);
199  }
200
201  private void postThrowable(Throwable throwable) {
202    Log.e(TAG, throwable.getMessage(), throwable);
203    this.throwable.postValue(throwable);
204  }
205
206  @Override
207  public void onSharedPreferenceChanged(SharedPreferences sharedPreferences, @Nullable String key) {
208    //noinspection DataFlowIssue
209    if (key.equals(sportKey)) {
210      List<League> leagues = leaguesBySport.getOrDefault(prefs.getString(key, ""), List.of());
211      idToLeague.clear();
212      //noinspection DataFlowIssue
213      idToLeague.putAll(
214          leagues.stream().collect(Collectors.toMap(League::getId, Function.identity())));
215      this.leagues.postValue(leagues);
216    } else if (key.equals(leagueKey)) {
217      fetchTeams(prefs.getString(leagueKey, "0"));
218    }
219  }
220}
